cast.name: 理查德·格里克 Richard Grieco
亚斯明·布里兹 Yasmine Bleeth

introduction: Whack the Don In the spirit of the greatest "Mob" themed buddy comedies of all time from "Some Like It Hot" to "Midnight Run", "Whack the Don" is a wild and crazy journey with hard edge humor and violence to match. Joey, a perpetual screw up and Nick, a self-fancied ladies' man and "brains" of the duo have been friends for life, sharing the common bond of never being able to hold a job. When a Mob Boss has his prize possession, Al Capone's fedora, stolen from him, Joey and Nick fall into what they consider the job that is a dream come true - "an offer they can't refuse" - simply steal the coveted cravat back. Little do they know that what is in store is not a dream, but a comic nightmare light year beyond their skill set.—SG
